com.camerontec.util.data

Interface BufferOnByteArray

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Buffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SafeBufferOnByteArray, UnsafeBuffer

    public interface BufferOnByteArray
extends Buffer
    Interface to be implemented by buffer implementations that are layered on top of a byte array.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.camerontec.util.data.Buffer

        SUGGESTED_DEFAULT_BYTE_ORDER

      • wrap

        BufferOnByteArray wrap(byte[] array)
        Wrap an on heap byte array.
        Parameters:
        array - The on heap byte array. Must not be null.
